Articles.Content:
I just purchased KSP a few hours ago, have yet to get any information in regards to how I\'m supposed to get the newest version. How long does that e-mail take to go out?

I\'ve been playing the demo and am enjoying it quite a lot. But I simply want MOAR. So I\'m a bit impatient.

Welcome to KSP. Dont kill too many Kerbals!

Welcome! Always nice to see an interest in these games. Have fun and try not to be too much of a sadistic KerbalKiller.
